demo_parsing.note: This file contains parsed products and talking points from the demo training manuals. Md file is markdown, a text format for formatting documents. I've created this JSON version instead as requested.

featured.name: Nature's Fynd Meatless Breakfast Patties – Original

talking_points: Nature's Fynd is a new vegan foods company made with Fy. • Fy is a nutritional fungi protein. • Fy is a complete, vegan protein with all 20 essential amino acids.
Our Meatless Breakfast Patties have 75% less fat than traditional pork sausage.
Our Dairy-Free Cream Cheese is nut-free, soy-free and gluten-free.
Fy is fungi-based and is made through a fermentation process - similar to how sourdough bread is made with a sourdough starter.
Fy is better for the environment. At scale, Fy uses 99% less water, and emits 94% fewer greenhouse gases than traditional agriculture.

equipment_supplies: Sneeze Guard – REQUIRED for Cooking Demos
required_materials.goal: Sell 15 units of product if stock is available. PRODUCT ALLOWANCE: $35

talking_points: Quality taste and value for the customer
Great for lunches and quick snacks

sampling_attire: Black or white polo shirt, no logos (or SBG logo)
Black apron, no logos (optional but preferred)
bring_from_home: Black fabric tablecloth (covering table legs all the way to the floor preferred)
required_materials.goal: Sampling goal: 100 samples of BAR-S Ham. Sales Goal: 50 units of BAR-S Ham. PURCHASES NOT TO EXCEED $37.00 including tax.

real_california_milk: California leads the nation in sustainable dairy farming.
Real California Milk products are made with 100% Real California Milk.
99% of California's dairy farms are family owned and operated, most being multi-generational farmers.
joseph_farms_cheese: What began as a small family farm has now grown into an internationally recognized brand, sold across the United States, and around the world, including Europe, Latin America, Africa, and Asia. The Joseph Farms label symbolizes all natural, (No Artificial Hormones including rBST) world-class quality cheese, and is the trusted brand of choice for customers around the world.

Joseph Farms master cheese makers use generations of experience to slowly craft each cheese, ensuring the uncompromised quality and delicious mouth-watering flavors that have earned countless awards. Their cheese is then aged to perfection in a carefully controlled environment, which develops the unique flavor of each of our varieties.
Provides an excellent source of calcium.

bring_from_home: Small Trash Can or Trash Bag
what_to_wear: Black, close-toed non-slip shoes (no open-toed shoes or gym shoes)
required_materials.goal: Distribution Goals: 100 units each of Joseph Farms Mexican Blend, Cheddar Jack Shredded, Queso Quesadilla Shredded. Do not exceed $56.43 (including tax).

featured.name: Beyond Good 70% Cocoa Pure Dark - Madagascar
Beyond Good 73% Cocoa Salted Caramel - Uganda
Beyond Good 73% Cocoa Toasted Hazelnut - Uganda

talking_points: The Pure Dark 70% Cocoa bar is from Madagascar. • These have notes of red fruit, like cherry and raspberry.
The Salted Caramel 73% Cocoa and Toasted Hazelnut 73% bars are from Uganda. • These are rich and chocolatey with notes of vanilla and apricot.
These bars have those unique flavors because they are single origin chocolate. These are the only single origin chocolate in Whole Foods Market that was made in Africa.
Beyond Good purchases its cocoa directly from farmers in Madagascar and Uganda.
Our company annually tests for heavy metal in our chocolate.
